meanings.definition: Of small or unimpressive size or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The toy car was the dumpiest in the collection.
meanings.sent2: The puppy in the litter was the dumpiest of them all.
meanings.sent3: Even though it was the dumpiest house on the block, it had the most character.
meanings.sent4: Her old, dumpiest shoes carried her through many adventures.
meanings.sent5: The dumpiest flower in the garden still managed to brighten up the yard.

meanings.definition: To discard or dispose of something unceremoniously.
meanings.sent1: She decided to dumpiest the broken vase in the trash.
meanings.sent2: After the party, they had to dumpiest all the leftover food.
meanings.sent3: He tried to dumpiest his old homework in the recycling bin.
meanings.sent4: The decision to dumpiest the project was a tough one.
meanings.sent5: The chef had to dumpiest the burnt dish and start over.

meanings.definition: A place where waste is deposited.
meanings.sent1: The landfill was the dumpiest in the county.
meanings.sent2: The alley behind the restaurant served as a dumpiest for old boxes.
meanings.sent3: The raccoons found a feast in the dumpiest behind the grocery store.
meanings.sent4: The dumpiest was overflowing with discarded furniture.
meanings.sent5: The dumpiest smelled of rotten food and old clothes.
